Ride With Care

Professional Transportation Services for Seniors in Lithonia, GA

Whether it’s a doctor’s visit, dialysis, or a grocery run, HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC provides compassionate, senior transportation services in Lithonia, GA, always on time, always reliable.

Call Us Today

(678) 362-3094
(404) 644-4127

Safe & On-Time

Covered Transport Benefits and Support

We offer non-emergency medical transportation and personalized ride support for seniors. Our transport services promote freedom, dignity, and access to essential appointments.
  • Medical Appointment Rides – Reliable medical transportation to hospitals, clinics, and physicians
  • Therapy & Treatment Transport – Non-emergency medical transport, Lithonia clients can depend on
  • Pharmacy & Grocery Runs – Transportation services for errands, prescriptions, and shopping
  • Errands & Activities – Safe senior transportation to community events, visits, and outings
  • Medicaid Transportation Coverage – We coordinate all Medicaid transportation benefits when applicable
Contact Us

Ride Reliability Always

What Makes Us Reliable Ride Partners

When it comes to senior transportation in Lithonia, GA, HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC stands out for professionalism, safety, and a compassionate presence with every ride.

Trained Senior Transporters

Our friendly transporters assist with door-to-door support, ensuring safe transitions and warm, respectful interactions every step of the way.

Flexible Trip Scheduling

Our transport services adapt to changing schedules, including recurring routines, last-minute appointments, and weekend senior activities.

Medicaid Transport Experts

We specialize in handling Medicaid transportation benefits, helping families navigate approvals and trip coordination with no added stress.

Call to Schedule

Call Now to Schedule Transport

Need trusted medical transportation or daily transport services in Lithonia, GA? Call HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC now at (678) 362-3094, your reliable senior transportation partner.
